page.title: 13All Saints Church Glossop
page.content: The main{Anglican}church is{All {Saints}in Old Glossop. Although the church contains some old stonework it was completely rebuilt in{1915.} {Father Heath}is the priest in charge of the church. His main role is to lead the people in worship, and to help people understand the meaning of life. A lot of his time is spent in visiting the sick and the elderly. There are two Sunday services at{ {8am}and{10.30am.}Also there are weekday masses on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays. Attendance at the services varies, there is more on a special festival day or during Holy Week. The church is used by the following church groups, the Mother's Union, Bell Ringers, Social Club, Cubs and Brownies.
